name: SHMediaItemProperty
desc: Constants for the media item property names.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a property key for the specified property.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a property key for the specified property.

items.name: static let title: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the title property of a media item.

items.name: static let subtitle: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the subtitle property of a media item.

items.name: static let artist: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the artist property of a media item.

items.name: static let artworkURL: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the artwork URL property of a media item.

items.name: static let videoURL: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the video URL property of a media item.

items.name: static let genres: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the genres property of a media item.

items.name: static let explicitContent: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the explicit content property of a media item.

items.name: static let ISRC: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) property of a media item.

items.name: static let appleMusicURL: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the Apple Music URL property of a media item.

items.name: static let appleMusicID: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the Apple Music ID of a media item.

items.name: static let webURL: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the web URL property of a media item.

items.name: static let shazamID: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the Shazam ID property of a media item.

items.name: static let matchOffset: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the match offset property of a matched media item.

items.name: static let frequencySkew: SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: The key to access the frequency skew property of a matched media item.
